thread.title: BRIEF-Blueprint Medicines Q4 Loss Per Share $1.23

title: BRIEF-Blueprint Medicines Q4 Loss Per Share $1.23
text: 15 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Blueprint Medicines Q4 Loss Per Share $1.23 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Blueprint Medicines Corp: * BLUEPRINT MEDICINES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $1.23 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-1.11 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * BLUEPRINT MEDICINES - EXPECTS EXISTING CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND INVESTMENTS TO FUND OPERATING EXPENSES, CAPITAL EXPENDITURES INTO MIDDLE OF 2020 * AS OF DEC 31, 2017, CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND INVESTMENTS OF $673.4 MILLION, VERSUS $268.2 MILLION AS OF DEC 31, 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
